title: Companion for Antenna
content: I’m doing a website job. The logo is set in Antenna, and the original designer told me I should use a less square sans for the headlines. Do you have any suggestions? I wouldn’t normally pair two sans serifs, but in this case the logo is just a single word.
author: frode frank

comments.content:
Houschka?  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-g-type/houschka/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201104200/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-g-type/houschka/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-g-type/houschka/")  
Maybe too round?

Maybe you can negotiate for a slab serif.
Yes, to round. I should mention the logo is caps only.
